name: Lineslineslines
tagline: Detects and draws lines where there are edges in an image
body:
Does a Hough transform to detect lines that are most likely in the image. 

Start Image:
![Original image](https://raw.github.com/aneemtalukder/lineslineslines/master/original_image.png)

First a binary image with all the edges in the image like this one: 
![Binary edge image](https://raw.github.com/aneemtalukder/lineslineslines/master/images/binary_edge.png)

Then applies Hough transform, which parametrizes the image to polar coordinates. Here is how it looks when converted to polar coordinates (like a lot of sine waves!):
![Hough transform](https://raw.github.com/aneemtalukder/lineslineslines/master/images/hough_transform.png)

Finally we take the information from the Hough transform image to draw lines that are most likely occurring in the image (right now the lines detected have infinite length, I may at some point write an algorithm to clip these to finite and appropriate lengths):
![Lines](https://raw.github.com/aneemtalukder/lineslineslines/master/images/lines.png)
